title: 3dTqual
description: Computes a quality index for each sub-brick in a 3D+time dataset.

spearman.title: Spearman correlation flag
spearman.description: Quality index is 1 minus the Spearman (rank) correlation coefficient of each sub-brick with the median sub-brick (default method).

quadrant.title: Quadrant correlation flag
quadrant.description: Quality index is 1 minus the quadrant correlation coefficient as the quality index.

autoclip.title: Autoclip flag
autoclip.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the median sub-brick, only compute correlation between high-intensity voxels.

automask.title: Automask flag
automask.description: Automatically mask and compute correlation only across high-intensity (presumably brain) voxels.

clip.title: Clip value
clip.description: Clip off values below given threshold in the median sub-brick.

mask.title: Mask dataset
mask.description: Compute correlation only across masked voxels from the given dataset.

range.title: Range flag
range.description: Print the median-3.5*MAD and median+3.5*MAD values with each quality index for plotting.
